compatibility.notes: OLDAP-2.5 is a permissive license that allows for broad compatibility with other permissive licenses. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses like GPL.

key_requirements: Maintain all copyright notices and conditions in redistributions.
Include the license text in all distributions of the Software.
Obtain written permission for trademark use.
license.name: OLDAP-2.5
obligations: Retain copyright statements and notices in redistributions of source code.
Reproduce copyright statements, notices, conditions, and disclaimers in binary redistributions.
Include a verbatim copy of the license document in redistributions.
Do not use the names and trademarks of authors and copyright holders for promotion without permission.
